name: Mind Control
description: Take control of your opponent's next queued card and play it as your own.

immediateEffect.script: if (OpponentQueue.Count > 0) { var stolen = OpponentQueue[0]; OpponentQueue.RemoveAt(0); PlayerQueue.Add(stolen); Log(PlayerDisplayName + " takes control of " + stolen.Name + "!"); } else { Log(OpponentDisplayName + " has no cards to control!"); }
